SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.7: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.7.2: Proportion of the population with high levels of confidence in selected government institutions
STAT_CONC_DEF: This indicator measures the percentage of the population with high levels of confidence in selected government institutions.
DATA_COMP: Data were readily available to report on this indicator as specified by the metadata. Please refer to the sources to access additional information on the metadata or source.
REC_USE_LIM:
This is a proxy indicator. The UN Global indicator states: “Proportion of population who believe decision-making is inclusive and responsive, by sex, age, disability and population group”.

The user is advised that the estimates flagged with [note 1] are considered to be of marginal quality due to high sampling variability, and should be used with caution.

fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 16.7.2 : Proportion de la population ayant une grande confiance envers certaines institutions gouvernementales
fr.STAT_CONC_DEF: Cet indicateur mesure la proportion de la population ayant une grande confiance envers certaines institutions gouvernementales.
fr.DATA_COMP: Data were readily available to report on this indicator as specified by the metadata. Please refer to the sources to access additional information on the metadata or source.
fr.REC_USE_LIM:
Il s’agit d’un indicateur de substitution. L’indicateur mondial des Nations Unies indique : « Proportion de la population qui estime que la prise de décisions est ouverte et réactive, par sexe, âge, situation au regard du handicap et groupe de la population ».

L’utilisateur est prié de noter que les estimations désignés par [note 1] sont considérés comme de qualité moindre en raison de la grande variabilité de l’échantillonnage et doivent donc être utilisés avec prudence.
